alert.note: Alert for Lewis (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 01 at 1:31PM EST until January 01 at 2:15PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lewis County in northeastern Kentucky... * Until 215 PM EST. * At 130 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Goddard, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Vanceburg, Head of Grassy, Camp Dix, Saint Paul, Firebrick, Harris, Kinniconick, Tannery, Emerson, Garrison, Petersville, Stricklett, Glen Springs and Rexton. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
